name: cyberchef
tagline: A web-based toolbox for encoding, decoding, and data analysis
description: CyberChef is a web-based platform for performing a wide range of cyber operations like encoding, decoding, encryption, compression, analysis and data manipulation. It runs entirely in the browser and can be self-hosted.

features.title: Cyber Operations
features.description: Encode, decode, encrypt, and decrypt data. Swiss Army knife for data

features.title: Browser
features.description: No installation needed, runs entirely in browser. Instant access anywhere

features.title: Recipe System
features.description: Chain operations together for complex tasks. Powerful workflow automation

features.title: Data Analysis
features.description: Parse and analyze various data formats. Comprehensive toolset

features.title: Compression Tools
features.description: Handle compressed and archived data. Universal format support

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Run your own instance for sensitive operations. Complete privacy and security
